name: Dungeon Guardians
description:
A very simple (and barely functional) tower defence game.

Click on walls to place your imps, 25 gold each.

They will take on an endless wave of adventurers who are constantly getting faster and more health (Very Broken).

Upgrade your imps damage, 50 gold extra each upgrade.

If an adventurer reaches your chest, you lose 100 gold and 100 score.

Reach 0 Gold, and you lose.

Also watch out! Adventurers sometimes kill your imps!

This was made in just under 3 hours in one sitting for the Friday Night Game jam #2020-35

This is my first 3 hour game jam, not really happy with the result, but it was fun to try. If I do another one of these i'm going to focus on trying to come up with something more unique instead of spending all my time making basic tower defence mechanics that barely work haha.
